info.author: Erik Max Francis
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
This is a very simple module which allows for conversion from
    normal dates (via 'time.time', 'time.localtime', etc.) to
    Discordian dates (a silly made-up dating system that divides a
    year into five seasons of 73 days each).  The module can either be
    used as a standalone command line application (which prints the
    current date in Discordian form) or as a extension module.
info.keywords: Gregorian date, date conversion, calendars, Discordian calendar
info.name: PyDiscord
info.summary: A simple module for converting dates from Gregorian to Discordian
info.html_description:
This is a very simple module which allows for conversion from
normal dates (via ‘time.time’, ‘time.localtime’, etc.) to Discordian dates (a silly made-up dating system that divides a year into five seasons of 73 days each). The module can either be used as a standalone command line application (which prints the current date in Discordian form) or as a extension module.
